CmdLine: apt-get update &&    apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends       libfreetype6 libpng3 &&    pip3 install --upgrade --no-cache-dir       matplotlib seaborn notebook &&    rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/* &&    mkdir /root/.jupyter &&    mkdir /JupyterNotebooks COPY  ./jupyter_notebook_config.py /root/.jupyter/jupyter_notebook_config.py
Commands.Name: run
